Activity: Arrive at the office, grab a coffee, and review my to-do list for the week. Quickly browse headlines on Bloomberg and the Financial Times to stay updated on market news.
Log in to project management software (e.g., Asana/Jira) and review project progress. Check for any urgent notifications or tasks requiring immediate attention.
Send an email to @larch-1, @dsde-1, @qres-1, @sdev-1, @comp-1 to request updated progress reports from each team. Subject: Weekly Project Update Request
Review incoming progress reports and identify potential roadblocks or delays. Start drafting a preliminary progress report for internal stakeholders.

Hold a brief stand-up meeting with the development team (@larch-1, @sdev-1, @sdev-2, @devops-1) to discuss progress on the trading platform and address any technical challenges. Prioritize critical tasks.
Meet with @comp-1 to discuss any compliance-related issues that may be impacting project timelines or require immediate action. Confirm next steps for regulatory approval.
Lunch Break. Step out for a quick lunch at a nearby cafe to clear my head.

Meet with @qres-1, @qres-2, @qres-3, @dsde-1, @dsde-2 to discuss model performance and backtesting results. Identify areas for improvement and allocate resources accordingly. Ask them to provide the detailed model performance and backtesting results.
Review the fund's legal structure with @legal-1 and finalize the legal documents for SEC registration. Clarify any ambiguities and ensure compliance with regulatory requirements.
Update project timelines and resource allocation based on the morning's meetings and progress reports. Identify any potential risks and develop mitigation strategies.

Prepare a draft project report summarizing accomplishments, challenges, and next steps for senior management (@cio-1, @coo-1). Include key metrics and highlight areas where the project is exceeding expectations.
Respond to emails, address outstanding tasks, and prepare for tomorrow's meetings. Review the overall project plan and make adjustments as needed.
Final check of emails and task list before leaving for the day. Briefly review the plan for tomorrow.
